Adb and Fastboot permission

file path

-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 739 Sep 4 17:28 /etc/udev/rules.d/51-android.rules

file content

SUBSYSTEM=="usb", ATTR{idVendor}=="18d1", ATTR{idProduct}=="d00d", MODE="0666", OWNER="tiger"
SUBSYSTEM=="usb", ATTR{idVendor}=="05c6", ATTR{idProduct}=="9025", MODE="0666", OWNER="tiger"
SUBSYSTEM=="usb", ATTR{idVendor}=="05c6", ATTR{idProduct}=="9015", MODE="0666", OWNER="tiger"
SUBSYSTEM=="usb", ATTR{idVendor}=="18d1", ATTR{idProduct}=="9025", MODE="0666", OWNER="tiger"
SUBSYSTEM=="usb", ATTR{idVendor}=="18d1", ATTR{idProduct}=="d002", MODE="0666", OWNER="tiger"
SUBSYSTEM=="usb", ATTR{idVendor}=="05c6", ATTR{idProduct}=="9026", MODE="0666", OWNER="tiger"

summary

tiger 切换成自己的 用户名

重启udev

sudo /etc/init.d/udev restart
